review: I use this with HBO GO and You Tube a lot. I can also stream video from my android.I wish there were more support from Apple. I can't stream video from chrome on the iPad, which stinks. Few applications support casting at this time. But for the price this is a no-brainer. I wasn't sure how much I'd use it, but it's been almost nightly for the past few months.
author: T. Beaulieu

review: A bit sluggish, but I do like the chromecast concept and will use it with youtube on occasion.  However, I still use my roku for most other functions.
author: zaphod

review: Probably one of the most significant products that google has ever made.  This should be in everyone's house!!!!!
author: Jmyu

review: My father purchased this and I traded him for my Fire Stick. I have used a chromecast for a long time now and I just don't really like the way the Fire stick works. If I had to choose between the two I would pick the Chromecast for sure.
author: W1ll1am

review: A little bit tricky to setup and requires a few software install in your mobile or tablet, but once it's done it's completely addictive.Very stable and fast and images are pretty clear.
author: orlando encina

review: only need to get 2 more than my whole how will have them i love them that much!!!!

review: it was broken when I received it it must have been somebody else's return
